Hosted Web Projects

Here follows a list of my web apps, their sources, and a short description! Hooray!

Chimera

A D&D Digital Character Sheet. Currently only supports 4th edition, hopefully soon to have a 5th edition sheet as well. Uses React.js and soon to use Firebase with real-time stat tracking, snapshots, and other features to help make your life easier so you can focus more on the campaign.

source : app

Triangulate

Made to help my sister track rehabilitated Red Hawks. Hooks into the Google Maps API to allow for easy triangulation and data computations.

source : app

Bookprint

Upload any text file. Based on the parts of speech, see a unique image based on the uploaded text.

source : app

Pixelatore

Lightning fast pixelation of any image!

source : app

Super Party Horse

My first take on a javascript html5 game. You control a donkey and help protect the helpless cows from getting eaten by the relentless jaguars.

source : site

This is the personal blog of Alex Petersen.

I write about neat things—mainly coding practices and thoughts on games I'm playing right now

I code with the mantra "Make anything cool today?"
